# PR Checklist (paste in PR body or use template)

- [ ] Why: user outcome/problem statement included
- [ ] Scope change? **Yes/No** â†’ link ADR + spec diff
- [ ] Ownership: folders touched map to CODEOWNERS (auto-tagged)
- [ ] Tests: unit/integration/E2E results + coverage %
- [ ] Ops: runbook/SLO links updated
- [ ] Security/privacy: threat model updates, secrets check
- [ ] AI (if any): eval suite delta, safety checks pass/fail
